>Construction of pLYC12
acquire oligo ZH7			
acquire oligo ZH7R
acquire oligo ZH5
acquire oligo ZH5R
acquire oligo ZH8
acquire oligo ZH8R
acquire plasmid pLYC5
acquire plasmid pAtipiTrc
PCR ZH7,ZH5R on pLYC5	(2249 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH5,ZH8R on pLYC5	(4711 bp, pcrB)
PCR ZH8,ZH7R on pAtipiTrc (1061 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(Gibson, pLYC12)
Transform pLYC12	(Mach1, Amp)
